wikipedia_page.main: Steve Parry (born 19 October 1988) is a Welsh professional rugby league footballer who plays for the West Wales Raiders in Betfred League 1, and at representative level for Wales. He previously played at club level for the Cardiff Demons and the South Wales Scorpions as a stand-off or hooker.
